aguavberry.name: Aguav Berry

lansatberry.name: Lansat Berry
lansatberry.effect: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon holds one, its critical-hit ratio will increase when it's in a pinch.

liechiberry.effect: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon holds one, its Attack stat will increase when it's in a pinch.

occaberry.effect: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will lessen the damage taken from one supereffective Fire-type attack.

shucaberry.effect: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will lessen the damage taken from one supereffective Ground-type attack.

sitrusberry.effect: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon holds one, it can restore its own HP by a small amount during battle.

tamatoberry.effect: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. Using it on a Pokémon makes it more friendly but lowers its Speed base points.

tangaberry.effect: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will lessen the damage taken from one supereffective Bug-type attack.

wacanberry.effect: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will lessen the damage taken from one supereffective Electric-type attack.

wikiberry.effect: If held by a Pokémon, it restores the user's HP in a pinch, but it will cause confusion if the user hates the taste.

yacheberry.name: Yache Berry
yacheberry.effect: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will lessen the damage taken from one supereffective Ice-type attack.

absorbbulb.name: Absorb Bulb
absorbbulb.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Sp. Atk if the holder is hit with a Water-type attack. It can only be used once.

airballoon.name: Air Balloon
airballoon.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder will float in the air until hit. Once the holder is hit, this item will burst.

amuletcoin.name: Amulet Coin
amuletcoin.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It doubles any prize money received if the holding Pokémon joins a battle.

assaultvest.name: Assault Vest
assaultvest.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This offensive vest raises Sp. Def but prevents the use of status moves.

berrysweet.name: Berry Sweet
berrysweet.effect: A berry-shaped sweet. When a Milcery holds this, it spins around happily.

bigroot.name: Big Root
bigroot.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts the amount of HP the holder restores from HP-stealing moves.

bindingband.name: Binding Band
bindingband.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a band that increases the power of binding moves used by the holder.

blackbelt.name: Black Belt
blackbelt.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This belt helps the wearer to focus and boosts the power of Fighting-type moves.

blackglasses.name: Black Glasses
blackglasses.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a pair of shady-looking glasses that boost the power of Dark-type moves.

blacksludge.name: Black Sludge
blacksludge.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It gradually restores HP to Poison-type Pokémon. It damages any other type.

blunderpolicy.name: Blunder Policy
blunderpolicy.effect: Raises Speed sharply when a Pokémon misses with a move because of accuracy.

brightpowder.name: BrightPowder
brightpowder.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It casts a tricky glare that lowers the opposing Pokémon's accuracy.

bugmemory.name: Bug Memory
bugmemory.effect: A memory disc that contains Bug-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

cellbattery.name: Cell Battery
cellbattery.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Attack if the holder is hit with an Electric-type attack. It can only be used once.

charcoal.name: Charcoal
charcoal.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a combustible fuel that boosts the power of Fire-type moves.

choiceband.name: Choice Band
choiceband.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This curious headband boosts Attack but only allows the use of one move.

choicescarf.name: Choice Scarf
choicescarf.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This curious scarf boosts Speed but only allows the use of one move.

choicespecs.name: Choice Specs
choicespecs.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. These curious glasses boost Sp. Atk but only allow the use of one move.

cleansetag.name: Cleanse Tag
cleansetag.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It helps keep wild Pokémon away if the holder is the head of the party.

cloversweet.name: Clover Sweet
cloversweet.effect: A clover-shaped sweet. When a Milcery holds this, it spins around happily.

damprock.name: Damp Rock
damprock.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It extends the duration of the move Rain Dance when used by the holder.

darkmemory.name: Dark Memory
darkmemory.effect: A memory disc that contains Dark-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

destinyknot.name: Destiny Knot
destinyknot.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder becomes infatuated, the opposing Pokémon will be, too.

dragonfang.name: Dragon Fang
dragonfang.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This hard and sharp fang boosts the power of Dragon-type moves.

dragonmemory.name: Dragon Memory
dragonmemory.effect: A memory disc that contains Dragon-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

ejectbutton.name: Eject Button
ejectbutton.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder is hit by an attack, it will be switched out of battle.

ejectpack.name: Eject Pack
ejectpack.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. When the holder's stats are lowered, it will be switched out of battle.

electricmemory.name: Electric Memory
electricmemory.effect: A memory disc that contains Electric-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

electricseed.name: Electric Seed
electricseed.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Defense on Electric Terrain. It can only be used once.

everstone.name: Everstone
everstone.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. A Pokémon holding this peculiar stone is prevented from evolving.

eviolite.name: Eviolite
eviolite.effect: A mysterious evolutionary lump. When held by a Pokémon that can still evolve, it raises both Defense and Sp. Def.

expertbelt.name: Expert Belt
expertbelt.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a well-worn belt that slightly boosts the power of supereffective moves.

fairymemory.name: Fairy Memory
fairymemory.effect: A memory disc that contains Fairy-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

fightingmemory.name: Fighting Memory
fightingmemory.effect: A memory disc that contains Fighting-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

firememory.name: Fire Memory
firememory.effect: A memory disc that contains Fire-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

flameorb.name: Flame Orb
flameorb.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a bizarre orb that will afflict the holder with a burn during battle.

floatstone.name: Float Stone
floatstone.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This very light stone reduces the weight of a Pokémon when held.

flowersweet.name: Flower Sweet
flowersweet.effect: A flower-shaped sweet. When a Milcery holds this, it spins around happily.

flyingmemory.name: Flying Memory
flyingmemory.effect: A memory disc that contains Flying-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

focusband.name: Focus Band
focusband.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder may endure a potential KO attack, leaving it with just 1 HP.

focussash.name: Focus Sash
focussash.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder has full HP, it will endure a potential KO attack with 1 HP. The item then disappears.

fullincense.name: Full Incense
fullincense.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This exotic-smelling incense makes the holder bloated and slow moving.

ghostmemory.name: Ghost Memory
ghostmemory.effect: A memory disc that contains Ghost-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

grassmemory.name: Grass Memory
grassmemory.effect: A memory disc that contains Grass-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

grassyseed.name: Grassy Seed
grassyseed.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Defense on Grassy Terrain. It can only be used once.

gripclaw.name: Grip Claw
gripclaw.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It extends the duration of multi-turn attacks, such as Bind and Wrap.

groundmemory.name: Ground Memory
groundmemory.effect: A memory disc that contains Ground-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

hardstone.name: Hard Stone
hardstone.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a durable stone that boosts the power of Rock-type moves.

heatrock.name: Heat Rock
heatrock.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It extends the duration of the move Sunny Day when used by the holder.

heavydutyboots.name: Heavy-Duty Boots
heavydutyboots.effect: These boots prevent the effects of traps set on the battlefield.

icememory.name: Ice Memory
icememory.effect: A memory disc that contains Ice-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

icyrock.name: Icy Rock
icyrock.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It extends the duration of the move Hail when used by the holder.

ironball.name: Iron Ball
ironball.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It lowers Speed and allows Ground-type moves to hit Flying types and holders that are levitating.

kingsrock.name: King's Rock
kingsrock.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. When the holder successfully inflicts damage, the target may also flinch.

laggingtail.name: Lagging Tail
laggingtail.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is tremendously heavy and makes the holder move slower than usual.

laxincense.name: Lax Incense
laxincense.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The beguiling aroma of this incense may cause attacks to miss its holder.

leek.name: Leek
leek.effect: An item to be held by Farfetch'd. This very long and stiff stalk of leek boosts its critical-hit ratio.

leftovers.name: Leftovers
leftovers.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder's HP is slowly but steadily restored throughout every battle.

lifeorb.name: Life Orb
lifeorb.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts the power of moves but at the cost of some HP on each hit.

lightball.name: Light Ball
lightball.effect: An item to be held by Pikachu. It's a puzzling orb that boosts its Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

lightclay.name: Light Clay
lightclay.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. Protective moves like Light Screen and Reflect will be effective longer.

lovesweet.name: Love Sweet
lovesweet.effect: A heart-shaped sweet. When a Milcery holds this, it spins around happily.

luckincense.name: Luck Incense
luckincense.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It doubles any prize money received if the holding Pokémon joins a battle.

luckyegg.name: Lucky Egg
luckyegg.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's an egg filled with happiness that earns the holder extra Exp. Points in battle.

luminousmoss.name: Luminous Moss

machobrace.name: Macho Brace
machobrace.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This stiff, heavy brace helps Pokémon grow strong but cuts Speed in battle.

magnet.name: Magnet
magnet.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a powerful magnet that boosts the power of Electric-type moves.

mentalherb.name: Mental Herb
mentalherb.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder shakes off move-binding effects to move freely. It can be used only once.

metalcoat.name: Metal Coat
metalcoat.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a special metallic film that can boost the power of Steel-type moves.

metalpowder.name: Metal Powder
metalpowder.effect: An item to be held by Ditto. Extremely fine yet hard, this odd powder boosts the Defense stat.

metronome.name: Metronome
metronome.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts moves used consecutively but only until a different move is used.

miracleseed.name: Miracle Seed
miracleseed.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a seed imbued with life-force that boosts the power of Grass-type moves.

mistyseed.name: Misty Seed
mistyseed.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Sp. Def on Misty Terrain. It can only be used once.

muscleband.name: Muscle Band
muscleband.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This headband exudes strength, slightly boosting the power of physical moves.

mysticwater.name: Mystic Water
mysticwater.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This teardrop-shaped gem boosts the power of Water-type moves.

nevermeltice.name: Never-Melt Ice
nevermeltice.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a heat- repelling piece of ice that boosts the power of Ice-type moves.

normalgem.name: Normal Gem
normalgem.effect: A gem with an ordinary essence. When held, it strengthens the power of a Normal-type move one time.

oddincense.name: Odd Incense
oddincense.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This exotic-smelling incense boosts the power of Psychic-type moves.

pixieplate.name: Pixie Plate
pixieplate.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Fairy-type moves.

poisonbarb.name: Poison Barb
poisonbarb.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This small, poisonous barb boosts the power of Poison-type moves.

poisonmemory.name: Poison Memory
poisonmemory.effect: A memory disc that contains Poison-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

poweranklet.name: Power Anklet
poweranklet.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It reduces Speed but allows the holder's Speed stat to grow more after battling.

powerband.name: Power Band
powerband.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It reduces Speed but allows the holder's Sp. Def stat to grow more after battling.

powerbelt.name: Power Belt
powerbelt.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It reduces Speed but allows the holder's Defense stat to grow more after battling.

powerbracer.name: Power Bracer
powerbracer.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It reduces Speed but allows the holder's Attack stat to grow more after battling.

powerherb.name: Power Herb
powerherb.effect: A single-use item to be held by a Pokémon. It allows the holder to immediately use a move that normally requires a turn to charge.

powerlens.name: Power Lens
powerlens.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It reduces Speed but allows the holder's Sp. Atk stat to grow more after battling.

powerweight.name: Power Weight
powerweight.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It reduces Speed but allows the holder's max HP to grow more after battling.

protectivepads.name: Protective Pads
protectivepads.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. These pads protect the holder from effects caused by making direct contact with the target.

protector.name: Protector
protector.effect: A protective item of some sort. It is extremely stiff and heavy. It's loved by a certain Pokémon.

psychicmemory.name: Psychic Memory
psychicmemory.effect: A memory disc that contains Psychic-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

psychicseed.name: Psychic Seed
psychicseed.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Sp. Def on Psychic Terrain. It can only be used once.

pureincense.name: Pure Incense
pureincense.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It helps keep wild Pokémon away if the holder is the head of the party.

quickclaw.name: Quick Claw
quickclaw.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This light, sharp claw lets the bearer move first occasionally.

quickpowder.name: Quick Powder
quickpowder.effect: An item to be held by Ditto. Extremely fine yet hard, this odd powder boosts the Speed stat.

razorclaw.name: Razor Claw
razorclaw.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This sharply hooked claw increases the holder's critical-hit ratio.

reapercloth.name: Reaper Cloth
reapercloth.effect: A cloth imbued with horrifyingly strong spiritual energy. It's loved by a certain Pokémon.

redcard.name: Red Card
redcard.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. When the holder is hit by an attack, the attacker is removed from battle.

ribbonsweet.name: Ribbon Sweet
ribbonsweet.effect: A ribbon-shaped sweet. When a Milcery holds this, it spins around happily.

ringtarget.name: Ring Target
ringtarget.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. Moves that normally have no effect will land on a Pokémon holding it.

rockincense.name: Rock Incense
rockincense.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This exotic-smelling incense boosts the power of Rock-type moves.

rockmemory.name: Rock Memory
rockmemory.effect: A memory disc that contains Rock-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

rockyhelmet.name: Rocky Helmet
rockyhelmet.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder is hit, the attacker will also be damaged upon contact.

roomservice.name: Room Service
roomservice.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. Lowers Speed when Trick Room takes effect.

roseincense.name: Rose Incense
roseincense.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This exotic-smelling incense boosts the power of Grass-type moves.

rustedshield.name: Rusted Shield
rustedshield.effect: It is said that a hero used this shield to halt a terrible disaster in ancient times. But it's grown rusty and worn.

rustedsword.name: Rusted Sword
rustedsword.effect: It is said that a hero used this sword to halt a terrible disaster in ancient times. But it's grown rusty and worn.

safetygoggles.name: Safety Goggles
safetygoggles.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. These goggles protect the holder from both weather-related damage and powder.

scopelens.name: Scope Lens
scopelens.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a lens for scoping out weak points. It boosts the holder's critical-hit ratio.

seaincense.name: Sea Incense
seaincense.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This incense has a curious aroma that boosts the power of Water-type moves.

sharpbeak.name: Sharp Beak
sharpbeak.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a long, sharp beak that boosts the power of Flying-type moves.

shedshell.name: Shed Shell
shedshell.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This discarded carapace enables the holder to switch out of battle without fail.

shellbell.name: Shell Bell
shellbell.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder restores a little HP every time it inflicts damage on others.

silkscarf.name: Silk Scarf
silkscarf.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a sumptuous scarf that boosts the power of Normal-type moves.

silverpowder.name: SilverPowder
silverpowder.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a shiny silver powder that will boost the power of Bug-type moves.

smokeball.name: Smoke Ball
smokeball.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It enables the holder to flee from any wild Pokémon encounter without fail.

smoothrock.name: Smooth Rock
smoothrock.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It extends the duration of the move Sandstorm when used by the holder.

snowball.name: Snowball
snowball.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Attack if the holder is hit with an Ice-type attack. It can only be used once.

softsand.name: Soft Sand
softsand.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a loose, silky sand that boosts the power of Ground-type moves.

soothebell.name: Soothe Bell
soothebell.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The comforting chime of this bell calms the holder, making it friendly.

spelltag.name: Spell Tag
spelltag.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a sinister, eerie tag that boosts the power of Ghost-type moves.

starsweet.name: Star Sweet
starsweet.effect: A star-shaped sweet. When a Milcery holds this, it spins around happily.

steelmemory.name: Steel Memory
steelmemory.effect: A memory disc that contains Steel-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

stickybarb.name: Sticky Barb
stickybarb.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It damages the holder every turn and may latch on to Pokémon that touch the holder.

strawberrysweet.name: Strawberry Sweet
strawberrysweet.effect: A strawberry-shaped sweet. When a Milcery holds this, it will spin around happily.

terrainextender.name: Terrain Extender
terrainextender.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It extends the duration of the terrain caused by the holder's move or Ability.

throatspray.name: Throat Spray
throatspray.effect: Raises Sp. Atk when a Pokémon uses a sound-based move.

toxicorb.name: Toxic Orb
toxicorb.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a bizarre orb that will badly poison the holder during battle.

twistedspoon.name: TwistedSpoon
twistedspoon.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This spoon is imbued with telekinetic power and boosts Psychic-type moves.

utilityumbrella.name: Utility Umbrella
utilityumbrella.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This sturdy umbrella protects the holder from the effects of weather.

watermemory.name: Water Memory
watermemory.effect: A memory disc that contains Water-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

waveincense.name: Wave Incense
waveincense.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This incense has a curious aroma that boosts the power of Water-type moves.

weaknesspolicy.name: Weakness Policy
weaknesspolicy.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. Attack and Sp. Atk sharply increase if the holder is hit with a move it's weak to.

whiteherb.name: White Herb
whiteherb.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It will restore any lowered stat in battle. It can be used only once.

widelens.name: Wide Lens
widelens.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a magnifying lens that slightly boosts the accuracy of moves.

wiseglasses.name: Wise Glasses
wiseglasses.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This thick pair of glasses slightly boosts the power of special moves.

zoomlens.name: Zoom Lens
zoomlens.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder moves after its target moves, its accuracy will be boosted.

berryjuice.name: Berry Juice
berryjuice.effect: A 100 percent pure juice made of Berries. When consumed, it restores 20 HP to an injured Pokémon.
